action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: There are four distinct Tetris-like pieces in the image. From left to right: a green vertical piece combined with a purple plus-shaped piece, a large green vertical piece, a series of connected orange pieces forming horizontal steps, and two separate pink horizontal pieces with an L-shape above them.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.

Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image contains five puzzle pieces. One is purple, two are orange, one is pink with a small white square in the middle, and one is olive green. The purple piece connects to an olive green piece, and an orange piece connects to the olive green piece and stretches downwards. There is also a pink "T" shaped piece.
